import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import '../Styles/PlanSelection.css' import icon_acrylic from '../Images/icon-acrylic.png' function PlanSelection() { const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleClick(){ navigate("/login") } const[index,setIndex] = useState(0); return (
    Select Plan Address Checkout Select Clothes

Choose your plan

276$ / YEAR

) } export default PlanSelection
